name: Elk Murder HD
description:
Arcade-style shooting gallery fun influenced by current and classic hunting-type shooters.

FEATURES:

- Cute, harmless, loveable wapiti to shoot at
- 10 levels of increasing difficulty
- Photo-realistic artwork (outdoor scenes and wildlife)
- Upbeat original soundtrack
- Leaderboards for high scores and level completion times
- In-game ads
- Humor, wit, and an ironic embedded anti-hunting message arising from gameplay-narrative dissonance
- A pop-up that asks you to purchase "Super Elk Murder HD"
